subject: Super Bowl
Television
lead_paragraph: Halftime of Sunday’s Super Bowl XLII will last 28 minutes. It will feature a 12-minute concert by Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers, and probably some pyrotechnics and commercials to fill the gaps.
snippet: Halftime of Sunday’s Super Bowl XLII will last 28 minutes. It will feature a 12-minute concert by Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers, and probably some pyrotechnics and commercials to fill the gaps.
